data.subject: Stranded
data.lyric:
How to lose before beginning
 Cut the tie when it comes loose
 Find a girl to try and save
 and wait

data.subject: Graduate
data.lyric:
On the day you graduate
 take a little it's never too late
 on the day you graduate
 you won't turn

data.subject: Relativity
data.lyric:
If this is all just a matter of time
 and time doesn't matter outside of our minds
 then it's strang
